Text: quite an informative video on the dark matter research!

To download video from Learner.org

1) USE rtmpdump command line tool
2) rtmpdump -r rtmp://fms.scctv.net/annenberg//vod/physics_for_the_21st_century_01 -s http://www.learner.org/vod/swfs/player-licensed.swf -p "http://www.learner.org/vod/vod_window.html?pid=793" -o phy01.flv
3) replace 01 in rtmp://fms.scctv.net/annenberg//vod/physics_for_the_21st_century_01 with 02, 03 so on till 11... change output file name every time too-
4) create torrent and seed!

for more info on rtmpdump, see http://stream-recorder.com/forum/use-rtmpdump-rtmp-dump-tutorials-t8911.html

You can download other course videos from learner.org similarly and create torrents for the same... please help in creation and seeding :D

Here are some courses listed with the working rtmpdump commands for downloading :)
